title: PES(CS) vs RV(CS)
content: I'm getting PES through KCET and RV through COMEDK. I've seen many points for and against both so I'm unsure as to which one to go with.

comments.body: RV CS and it's not even close
+1 yep, its absolutely worth the extra fees through comedk
RV cs 100%. Easier syllabus , better grading , lesser students so better placements
Rv cs if you asked me this question 3 years back, but it's the same number of people at both the places, so it doesn't really matter that much.
I think others have already posted the reason, no need for me to reiterate
Pes cs has much more students no?
It's not even remotely the same lmao
